resources.string: Sorry. There was a problem. Please try again
There was a problem. Perhaps this photo is from a private user, or network issue.
There was a problem. Perhaps this video is from a private user, or network issue.
To turn off Quick Post-Later just return here to the settings
To turn OFF Quick Save mode, open Repost by tapping on the app icon
To turn OFF Quick Repost mode, open Repost by tapping on the app icon
Post-Later will automatically be selected, keeping photos and videos for you to post them later and bypassing the Selection Popup window.
Instagram will automatically be selected as the Repost (repost) destination, bypassing the Selection Popup window.
Photos and videos will automatically be saved to your phone, bypassing the Selection Popup window.
A selection popup window will appear allowing you to choose between reposting, keeping to repost later, saving to your phone or sharing with other apps.
The only way to make sure Repost is always available requires the constant notification (Android forces it). You can stop the notification but then use Share Link instead of Copy Link from Instagram.
Kept photos are posted using the Instagram app. Post’s caption needs to be pasted manually.

Kept photos are posted using Repost upload process. Faster and post’s caption gets automatically added to the post. DOES NOT APPLY TO VIDEOS. Social media share, emoji or tag features are not available yet. To enable this feature, login below to any Instagram account.
Please rate the app with 5 stars and help fellow Android users discover it. Thanks for the support!
How is your experience so far with VideoDownloaderIG?
That photo may be from a private account so it is not possible to VideoDownloaderIG it at this time.
There is no internet connection. Please check if you are connected and try again.
There are no email clients installed.

Please take 30 seconds to learn how to use VideoDownloaderIG.

You will be reposting from the Instagram App.

Just go through the next few screens to see how.
A watermark with author\'s profile picture and username will be displayed at bottom of photo
You are now logged in as
The caption was copied to the clipboard
Long press to paste in Instagram.
Try it yourself in Instagram.\nClick on three dots on next screen.

Instagram might require new permissions to be approved. If Instagram crashes when using VideoDownloaderIG, open Instagram, press on the upload button, upload a photo and accept the permission request. After, you can restart using VideoDownloaderIG.
You have updated to Android version 6.0 Marshmellow
VideoDownloaderIG is in standby mode. Click for more info.
Post scheduled.\nYou will be notified at the scheduled time.\nOpen notification to finish the posting.
No changes to caption. @VideoDownloaderIG and #VideoDownloaderIG will not be added to caption.
The caption when pasted will not contain @VideoDownloaderIG or #VideoDownloaderIG
Note: You won\'t see \'Copy URL\' on private photos.\nInstagram won\'t provide links of private users.
To VideoDownloaderIG multiple images/videos, upload them manually from the VideoDownloaderIG-Multi-Post folder. Paste the caption as usual.

By clicking "Confirm", you consent to the use of anonymous data (like your country) to be used to show relevant ads, and that you are at least 16 years old. You can read the terms in its entirety by clicking on the link in the Google Play app description for VideoDownloaderIG.\n\nWe thank you for installing our app and helping to improve the user experience by clicking "Confirm".
PHOTO WILL BE SENT TO INSTAGRAM
To VideoDownloaderIG you start the action in Instagram
Find a photo and click the three dots or paper airplane icon (look for Share Link)
You may need to scroll to find
The photo must be public for it to be available
You can click the Instagram icon to VideoDownloaderIG, or save the photo
The original caption will be in the clipboard
Upgrade to Remove Ads\\n\\nONE TIME PAYMENT
No Ads\nPriority Support by Developer\n100% Risk Free - Refund Anytime
Access to Photos, Media and Files
Needed for temp files to send to Instagram.
After you are Logged in Click Here
Use \'Share To...\' instead of Copy Link
Your purchase is pending and will be processed shortly.
Your purchase is complete. Thank you.
Important: Use \'Share To....\' then select Repost icon instead of Copy Link.
Your custom image will be displayed on the photo.
